description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref P0755.21 dated 27/05/2022 to allow for amendment of description to "" and to vary condition 2 to include the revised plan (Erection of 2/3 storey 87 bedroom and suites care home for the frail elderly (Class C2 Use) with ancillary and communal accommodation, together with associated landscaping, access arrangements, car and cycle parking, servicing, refuse and recycling) to : Erection of 2/3 storey 88 bedroom and suites care home for the frail elderly (Class C2 Use) with ancillary and communal accommodation, together with associated landscaping, access arrangements, car and cycle parking, servicing, refuse and recycling.
site_name: Havering College Of Further And Higher Education
decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below is considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in its own right and not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendment is deemed to be accepted:
- amendment to the second floor layout plan - by relocating and reducing the sizes of some service rooms to add an additional studio to the floor.

-Description: Erection of 2/3 storey 88 bedroom and suites care home for the frail elderly (Class C2 Use) with ancillary and communal accommodation, together with associated landscaping, access arrangements, car and cycle parking, servicing, refuse and recycling.
The applicant is advised that this amendment relates solely to the item detailed above and shown on drawing numbers 1 AA7077C-4003 REV B and not to any other deviation from the approved drawings.
Furthermore, this amendment does not in any way alter or remove any previous conditions imposed on the original approved application reference P0755.21.
